ai-patthana21.5:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.5:1.1_0: Not doing so, there is a cause of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.5:2.1_0: or excessiveness, unwholesome qualities arise in a good principle,
ai-patthana21.5:3.1_0: It’s not due to little cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.5:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.5:5.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to skillful qualities because of this skillful teaching.
ai-patthana21.5:6.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to unprofitable things with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.5:7.1_0: One who has not declared this because of disrespect.
ai-patthana21.5:7.1_1: You don’t haven’t declared this because of this teaching.
ai-patthana21.5:7.1_2: Such has not been declared by the Buddha, and the Teaching to be incorrectly, and what has not been declared by the Buddha.
ai-patthana21.5:7.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.5:7.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.5:8.1_0: Not repulsion arises in someone who isn’t skillful, skilled in dependent origination.
ai-patthana21.5:9.1_0: Not repulsion towards the teaching, skilled in loss, and embracing a cause.
ai-patthana21.5:10.1_0: Not in needing, or fact no being grasped. One who doesn’t have what is not declared by cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.5:10.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.5:10.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.5:11.1_0: They don’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.5:13.1_0: I haven’t declared a declaration, sights, or mind.
ai-patthana21.5:13.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.5:14.1_0: Not with the supermundane profitable results, a condition for the whole world.
ai-patthana21.5:14.1_1: Not with the supermundane profit, wholesome quality is skillful.
ai-patthana21.5:14.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.5:15.1_0: Not with the supermundane states, (of the supermundane) conditions, there is a reason for the sake of the skillful,.
ai-patthana21.5:16.1_0: Not looking at this way, they don’t give rise to the things that cause.
ai-patthana21.5:16.1_1: Not incomparable, you shouldn’t give rise to mundane because of this.
ai-patthana21.5:16.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana21.5:16.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.5:17.1_0: or perspectives known by doing some things ...
ai-patthana21.5:18.1_0: no unskillful quality doesn’t come to be known by direct knowledge, nor skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.5:19.1_0: Not by means of begging or understanding, there is no unskillful quality, no skillful quality, or unskillful.
ai-patthana21.5:20.1_0: or based on principles, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.5:20.1_1: no unskillful quality doesn’t arise because of direct knowledge, nor an unprofitable way.
ai-patthana21.5:21.1_0: Nor do they haven’t known or seen or heard in fact or immediately effectively.
